channel.title: CVE Feed for SICK AG -- SIM1012
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SICK AG -- SIM1012

item.title: CVE-2023-5288|2024-09-23T17:16:57.057Z -- sick%20ag -- sim1012
item.description: A remote unauthorized attacker may connect to the SIM1012, interact with the device and change configuration settings. The adversary may also reset the SIM and in the worst case upload a new firmware version to the device.
